DOC.brief_summary: An Open-Label, Multicenter, Phase I/II Clinical Trial to Identify the [6R] 5,10-methylenetetrahydrofolate Dose with Most Favorable Safety Prospect and Confirmed Ability to Mitigate High-Dose Methotrexate Induced Toxicity during Treatment of Osteosarcoma Patients
DOC.brief_title: Investigation of [6R] 5,10-methylenetetrahydrofolate as Rescue Therapy for Osteosarcoma Patients Treated With HDMTX.
DOC.criteria: Patients must have histological evidence of osteosarcoma including metastatic osteosarcoma.
